Package sample.JavaFX.UploadScene

Class UploadSceneController

java.lang.Object
sample.JavaFX.UploadScene.UploadSceneController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class UploadSceneController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
UploadSceneController controls the UploadScene. It covers all methods needed for the UploadScene. The class implements Initializable.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    UploadSceneController()
    This constructor is an emtpy constructor which throws an SQLException

    • handleUploadButtonClicked

      public void handleUploadButtonClicked()
      Method for handling when the upload button is clicked. Clear all fields if operation is successful

    • handleAddTagButtonClicked

      public void handleAddTagButtonClicked()
      Method for handling when the "+" button is clicked. Adds tag then clears the input field.

    • handleCreateAlbumButton

      public void handleCreateAlbumButton()
      Handles create album button clicked. Shows a dialog where user can write the name of the new album.

    • collectListViewTags

      public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> collectListViewTags()
      A method for collecting the tags in the listview
      Returns:
      an arraylist with all the tags

    • handleBackButtonClicked

      public void handleBackButtonClicked()
      A method for handling the backbutton. Sends you back to mainscene.

    • showAlertDialog

      public void showAlertDialog​(java.lang.String alertType)
      Shows alert dialog, used when user did not select an image

    • showConfirmationDialog

      public boolean showConfirmationDialog()
      Method that comes up when the listview with tags is empty and user tries to upload. Asks them if they are sure they want no tags
      Returns:
      boolean representing yes or no from user

    • initialize

      public void initialize​(java.net.URL url, java.util.ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Initialize method that gets run when the scene is loaded.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url - Location used to resolve relative paths for the root object, or null if the location is not known
      resourceBundle - Used to localize the root object, or null if the root object was not localized
